channel.title: Hit splats damage not in center
channel.description:
Hey guys, as i come to a near end to finish fixing bugs on my server ,theirs one im not really good at which is client sided, so i was wondering if you guys could help me out.
The picture will explain everything, i basically want the hits to be in the middle of the splash.
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/135/ad1c.png/][IMG]http://img135.imageshack.us/img135/5764/ad1c.png[/img][/URL]
please if you know anything please post, even if you have an idea,
thanks alot, Dell ++

item.title: Hit splats damage not in center
item.dc:creator: @Get_Blitz Get Blitz
item.description:
@Get_Blitz wrote:

Nice want to share themm <3

OnTopic: hm maybe the picture’s are messed up? you can try using photoshop sorry thats the only thing i can tell you since i am not good client sided.

Read full topic
